structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: On or before January 15 following the creation of the extension board, the county judge/executive shall call all duly appointed board members together for an organization meeting. The county judge/executive shall serve as chairman until all officers are elected. The officers of the board shall consist of a chairman, vice chairman, secretary and treasurer. The positions of secretary and treasurer may be held by the same person and this person may be other than a board member, with the approval of the director of extension.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 6, effective January 2, 1978. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 275, sec. 8.
